section.heading: Conversion to a mutual company.
section.text: A corporation issued a certificate of authority under this chapter shall not be converted into a mutual insurance company.

annotations.annotation: D.C. Law 15-56, in subsec. (b), substituted “company not involving a nonprofit hospital service plan or medical service plan unless” for “company unless”, and added subsec. (b-1).
